title: Greg Lambrecht, Founder Of Coravin
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Greg Lambrecht, founder of Coravin, which produces a device for pouring wine without opening the bottle. Harris also speaks with clothing designer Peter Manning.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Greg Lambrecht, founder of Coravin, which produces a device for pouring wine without opening the bottle.

Harris also speaks with Peter Manning, who created a clothing line for men 5' 8" and under.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
